description:
Invisible Zinc Sheer Defence Tinted Moisturiser SPF 50 Medium is a lightweight mineral shield with a sensitive skin formulation. Broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection and 2hr water-resistant.

Invisible Zinc Sheer Defence Tinted Moisturiser SPF 50 Medium is a lightweight moisturiser and high protection mineral sunscreen with a sheer tint. With only one active ingredient, Zinc Oxide acts as a barrier against the sun reflecting UV radiation away. Use daily to nourish, protect and help prevent the appearance of premature ageing of the skin caused by UV exposure.

- Sensitive skin formula.
- Frangrance free.
- Paraben free.
- Dermatologist tested.
- Non-comedogenic.

No Chemical UV Filters

Australian Made

Reef Friendly
name: Invisible Zinc Sheer Defence Spf 50 Tinted Moisturiser Sunscreen Medium 50g
